passportBlueprint.name: US_Passport_Blueprint
passportBlueprint.description: Blueprint for extracting information from US Passports

fields.name: firstName
fields.description: First name of the passport holder

fields.name: lastName
fields.description: Last name of the passport holder

fields.name: dateOfBirth
fields.description: Date of birth in the format DD MMM YYYY

fields.name: passportNumber
fields.description: US Passport number

fields.name: issueDate
fields.description: Date of issue in the format DD MMM YYYY

fields.name: expirationDate
fields.description: Date of expiration in the format DD MMM YYYY

fields.name: nationality
fields.description: Nationality of the passport holder

fields.name: sex
fields.description: Gender of the passport holder

einVerificationBlueprint.name: EIN_Verification_Letter_Blueprint
einVerificationBlueprint.description: Blueprint for extracting information from EIN Verification Letters

fields.name: businessName
fields.description: Legal name of business as provided to IRS

fields.name: ein
fields.description: Employer Identification Number (EIN)

fields.name: businessAddress
fields.description: Complete business address as registered with IRS

fields.name: issueDate
fields.description: Date when the EIN Verification Letter was issued

fields.name: taxPeriod
fields.description: The applicable tax period

form1120Blueprint.name: Form_1120_Income_Tax_Blueprint
form1120Blueprint.description: Blueprint for extracting information from Form 1120 Income Tax Returns

fields.name: corporateName
fields.description: Name of the corporation

fields.name: ein
fields.description: Employer Identification Number (EIN)

fields.name: taxPeriodBeginning
fields.description: Start date of the tax period

fields.name: taxPeriodEnding
fields.description: End date of the tax period

fields.name: totalIncome
fields.description: Total income reported

fields.name: totalDeductions
fields.description: Total deductions claimed

fields.name: taxableincome
fields.description: Taxable income amount

fields.name: totalTax
fields.description: Total tax due amount

fields.name: businessAddress
fields.description: Business address listed on the form

companyFormationBlueprint.name: Company_Formation_Blueprint
companyFormationBlueprint.description: Blueprint for extracting information from Company Formation documents

fields.name: companyName
fields.description: Legal name of the company

fields.name: formationDate
fields.description: Date when the company was formed

fields.name: stateOfFormation
fields.description: State where the company was formed

fields.name: entityType
fields.description: Type of business entity (LLC, Corporation, etc.)

fields.name: registeredAgent
fields.description: Name of the registered agent

fields.name: registeredAddress
fields.description: Registered office address

fields.name: fileNumber
fields.description: State file or document number

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current status of the company (Active, Inactive, etc.)

actionaryCompositionBlueprint.name: Actionary_Composition_Blueprint
actionaryCompositionBlueprint.description: Blueprint for extracting information from Actionary Composition documents

fields.name: companyName
fields.description: Company name as listed in the document

fields.name: totalShares
fields.description: Total number of shares issued

fields.name: shareClasses
fields.description: Different classes of shares if applicable

fields.name: shareholders
fields.description: Names of shareholders

fields.name: shareholderPercentages
fields.description: Percentage of shares held by each shareholder

fields.name: documentDate
fields.description: Date of the document

fields.name: authorizedSignatory
fields.description: Name of the person who signed the document
